text: Qin Hanzhang (Chinese: 秦含章; 19 February 1908 – 15 August 2019) was a Chinese engineer, scientist and supercentenarian. He was a known figure in the field of food science and industrial fermentation. He was also a scholar in the wine industry. In 1950, Premier Zhou Enlai appointed Qin as a counselor of the Ministry of Food Industry and the Ministry of Light Industry. ==References== ==Other websites== * Qinhanzhang.com 秦含章（北京）酒文化发展有限公司 Category:1908 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Chinese supercentenarians Category:Chinese engineers Category:Chinese academics Category:Scientists from Jiangsu Category:21st-century Chinese people Category:20th-century Chinese people
title: Qin Hanzhang
